title: Korea's Trade Data Vignette
text: live age increasing great power rivalry Indo-Pacific region, even relatively new geopolitical naming region causing controversies China. quite long time, region’s two great powers, China Japan, outsourced great power management United States ASEAN. However, recent years growing assertiveness Chinese foreign policy US’s pivot Asia, region seen rise US-centric minilateralisms one way another encircle China. long, Korea, despite iron-clad alliance US, taken active part minilateralisms avoid antagonizing China. Often two reasons cited : 1) Korea’s economic dependence China, 2) China’s influence North Korea, hence Korean Peninsula. Let’s visualize Korea’s trade dependence time. Korea’s Trade Dependence China, US, Japan, Vietnam China surpassed Japan United States Korea’s largest trading partner since mid-2000s. COVID-19, China’s share Korea’s trade reached 25%, declining since just 20%, still remaining largest trading partner. US’s share Korea’s trade around 15%, Japan Vietnam’s share 6% . following ranking Korea’s trading partners since foundation. , visualize rankings Korea’s trading partners time. title: Korea's Trade Data Vignette
text: Korea’s trade data important source studies Korean diplomacy, helping us understand trends tendencies Korean foreign policy. blog post, explored trade data kdiplo R package. visualized trade volume time, Korea’s trade dependence, rankings Korea’s trading partners time. data available kdiplo package. next blog post, explore Korea’s economic diplomacy bringing together trade data data Korean presidents’ bilateral diplomatic visits. what: Converting Korean-language Country Names into iso3c Country Codes — iso3c_kr
title: Converting Korean-language Country Names into iso3c Country Codes — iso3c_kr
text: iso3c_kr() Converts Korean country names iso3c country codes. Korean governmental data often uses country names Korean, without universal country codes. Sometimes, Korean-language country names consistent across different datasets. function designed assign universal iso3c country codes Korean-language country names make easier join different kinds data. can problems countries used country-year panel data format, especially countries gone political transitions Germany, Serbia, Vietnam, Yemen .

title: Korea's Trade Data — trade_data
text: trade_data returns dataset Korea's export import data country-year format. includes detailed information trade activities, export import values country year, along total export import figures.

title: Korea's Trade Data — trade_data
text: data frame 12 variables: iso3c character vector ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country codes. country character vector country names corresponding iso3c codes. year numeric vector years trade data available. export numeric vector representing USD value exports Korea respective countries year. default value reported Korean Statistical Information Service. imputed Correlates War project data former missing. import numeric vector representing USD value imports Korea respective countries year. default value reported Korean Statistical Information Service.imputed Correlates War project data former missing. total_export numeric vector indicating total value Korea's exports year reported Korean Statistical Information Service. total_import numeric vector indicating total value Korea's imports year reported Korean Statistical Information Service. export_kosis numeric vector representing export values Korea country recorded Korean Statistical Information Service. import_kosis numeric vector representing import values Korea country recorded Korean Statistical Information Service. export_cow numeric vector representing export values Korea country recorded Correlates War project. import_cow numeric vector representing import values Korea country recorded Correlates War project. export_cons_2015 numeric vector representing 2015 constant USD value exports Korea respective countries year. figures inflation-adjusted values export variable. Inflation adjustment done using US Census Bureau's R-CPI-U-RS price series. import_cons_2015 numeric vector representing 2015 constant USD value imports Korea respective countries year. figures inflation-adjusted values import variable. Inflation adjustment done using US Census Bureau's R-CPI-U-RS price series. total_export_cons_2015 numeric vector representing 2015 constant USD value Korea's total exports year. figures inflation-adjusted values total_export variable. Inflation adjustment done using US Census Bureau's R-CPI-U-RS price series. total_import_cons_2015 numeric vector representing 2015 constant USD value Korea's total imports year. figures inflation-adjusted values total_import variable. Inflation adjustment done using US Census Bureau's R-CPI-U-RS price series. updated_at date vector indicating last update date data.
